message.content:
cs.CV, cs.HC, cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with gesture recognition, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV) and human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The use of kinematic, cognitive, and biomechanic characteristics suggests a focus on robotics (cs.RO) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the use of machine learning classifiers indicates a possible connection to machine learning (cs.LG).
